body: I know once you prestige in all games you get vet rank, but how about for the older people that have been here since terrascape or mczone next to vet rank it says TS Vet for terrascape or MCZ Vet for mczone.
body_tagged: I know once you prestige in all games you get vet rank, but how about for the older people that have been here since terrascape or mczone next to vet rank it says TS Vet for terrascape or MCZ Vet for mczone.
title: Vet rank

replies.body: I don't see why we need this.

replies.body: I don't usually like being so critical, but I agree with Para. There's really no point for this. Also, you can lie about being a vet.
